books.author: by Lee Child
books.description: Jack Reacher, still in the Army, becomes involved in an investigation with elite agents from the F.B.I. and C.I.A.
books.name: NIGHT SCHOOL

books.author: by John Grisham
books.description: A whistleblower alerts a Florida investigator to judicial corruption involving the Mob and Indian casinos.
books.name: THE WHISTLER

books.author: by Michael Connelly
books.description: The detective Harry Bosch helps a small police department track a serial rapist, while as a P.I. he aids a billionaire in search of a possible heir.
books.name: THE WRONG SIDE OF GOODBYE

books.author: by Paula Hawkins
books.description: A psychological thriller set in the environs of London is full of complications and betrayals.
books.name: THE GIRL ON THE TRAIN

books.author: by Jeffrey Archer
books.description: The final installment of the Clifton Chronicles.
books.name: THIS WAS A MAN

books.author: by Christine Feehan
books.description: When two shifters meet in a San Antonio bakery, their feral sides leap to life.
books.name: LEOPARD'S FURY

books.author: by Fredrik Backman
books.description: A curmudgeon's gruff exterior masks a generosity of spirit. Originally published in Sweden in 2014.
books.name: A MAN CALLED OVE

books.author: by Nicholas Sparks
books.description: A man who became a single father when his marriage and business collapsed learns to take a chance on a new love.
books.name: TWO BY TWO

books.author: by Jodi Picoult
books.description: A medical crisis entangles a black nurse, a white supremacist father and a white lawyer.
books.name: SMALL GREAT THINGS

books.author: by Stephenie Meyer
books.description: A specialist in chemically controlled torture, on the run from her former employers, takes on one last job — pursuing a man with whom she joins forces. By the author of the Twilight series.
books.name: THE CHEMIST

books.author: by Mary Balogh
books.description: A duke helps transform a rags-to-riches orphan into a lady. A Westcott novel.
books.name: SOMEONE TO LOVE

books.author: by Janet Evanovich
books.description: Stephanie Plum pursues a fraternity member arrested for beating up a college dean and investigates a murder.
books.name: TRICKY TWENTY-TWO

books.author: by David Weber
books.description: In this volume of the Safehold science fiction series. the island realm of Charis prepares for a final battle against the monstrous Church of God Awaiting.
books.name: AT THE SIGN OF TRIUMPH

books.author: by John Sandford
books.description: Virgil Flowers of the Minnesota Bureau of Criminal Apprehension must deal with the theft of tigers from the local zoo.
books.name: ESCAPE CLAUSE

books.author: by Jill Shalvis
books.description: Rory's only ride home for Christmas is with the man she's longed for since high school.
books.name: ONE SNOWY NIGHT
